about.title: Meet Sarah Gerges
about.body: Sarah founded SA Online School to make language learning deeply human and accessible. Raised between Alexandria, Moscow, and Toronto, she believes languages are bridges that connect stories and careers. With a background in linguistics and educational leadership, Sarah leads a community of teachers who mentor students with patience, warmth, and strategic clarity.
about.highlight: We teach you to listen bravely, speak confidently, and belong anywhere.

rules.title: School Rules & Learning Agreement
rules.description: We keep our learning space respectful, responsive, and reliable. Please review before your first lesson.

sections.title: Attendance
sections.content: Please inform your teacher 12 hours before any absence. Two no-shows per term trigger a scheduling review.

sections.title: Refunds
sections.content: Unused sessions are refundable within 14 days of purchase. Completed lessons are non-refundable but transferable.

sections.title: Communication
sections.content: We coordinate primarily via WhatsApp and email. Please reply within 24 hours so we can adapt lessons in time.

sections.title: Learning Tools
sections.content: Lessons are hosted on Zoom with collaborative boards and shared documents. Keep materials handy for continuity.

rules.acknowledgement: I have read and agree to the School Rules.

contact.title: Start a conversation with our team
contact.subtitle: Tell us what you want to achieve and we'll match you with the right teacher.

policy.title: School Policy
policy.intro: Our policy keeps learning joyful, respectful, and transparent for every student and teacher.

sections.title: Booking & Scheduling
sections.content: Bookings close 6 hours before class. Emergency reschedules are handled through your teacher directly.

sections.title: Code of Conduct
sections.content: We celebrate diversity. Harassment, hate speech, or disrespectful behavior leads to immediate account review.

sections.title: Privacy
sections.content: All recordings and shared files remain confidential and are deleted within 60 days unless you request otherwise.
